DFREDSCE.ChatMessagePermissionHint: This defines the minimum permission level to see chat messages when effects are applied, removed, or expire. Setting this to None will never show chat messages.
DFREDSCE.AppControlsPermissionHint: This defines the minimum permission level to see and apply Convenient Effects through the application via the button on token controls. Setting this to None will disable the button entirely.
DFREDSCE.RemoveControlsPermissionHint: This defines the minimum permission level to remove Convenient Effects through the button on the token controls. Setting this to None will disable the button entirely.
DFREDSCE.ModifyStatusEffectsHint: This is how status effects on the token HUD will be modified. Replacing them means all other status effects will be removed in favor of the conditions provided by Convenient Effects. Adding them means they are appended to the end of the existing status effects. Requires a Foundry reload on change.
DFREDSCE.ShowChatMessageEffectDescriptio: This is when effect descriptions are shown on chat messages.
DFREDSCE.StatusEffectsSortOrderHint: This is how status effects are sorted in the token HUD. Requires a Foundry reload on change.
DFREDSCE.AllowPlayerCustomEffectsHint: If enabled, players will be allowed to create, duplicate, edit, and delete all custom effects.
DFREDSCE.IntegratewithATEHint: If enabled, certain effects will also change light emitted from tokens or the size of a token via Active Token Effects.',
DFREDSCE.IntegratewithTokenMagicHint: If enabled, certain effects will also apply a token magic filter to tokens via Token Magic.
DFREDSCE.PrioritizeTargetsHint: If enabled, effects will be applied to any targeted tokens instead of selected tokens.
DFREDSCE.ShowNestedEffectsHint: If enabled, nested effects will be shown in the application.
